728984f-b.text:
(1)
4768 Hylan Boulevard, south side, at Preston Avenue, showing the John Hales residence, known as the "Wakefield" (1898 to 1917 maps).
It was earlier (1874 map) the G.S. Becket house.
June 17, u926
P. L. Sperr
(2)
A daisy field in rear of the Hales residence. The view is
southward teward Raritan Bay.
June 17, 1926.
P. L. Sperr
(3)
Another view toward the Bay.
June 17, 1926.
P. L. Sperr
728984f-b.folder: Hylan Boulevard & Preston Avenue, Staten Island, NY
